New Records: Ranger Suárez became the first Phillies pitcher since 2010 to strike out the first five batters in a game
Key Match Events: Atlanta Braves hit three solo home runs in the game
Orlando Arcia homered twice, including a sixth-inning shot off Max Lazar
Phillies' Bryce Harper doubled twice but struggled with a wrist and elbow issue
Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies and Braves are both likely to reach the playoffs
Bryce Harper emphasized the importance of the upcoming games against the Braves
Reynaldo López had a strong performance on the mound
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies paid respects to Johnny and Matthew Gaudreau before the game
Manager Rob Thomson discussed the challenges of the game
The Braves moved within five games of the Phillies in the NL East standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Phillies reliever José Alvarado returned from the restricted list
Alec Bohm did not play due to a left hand injury
The upcoming pitching matchups were noted
Others: The game was overshadowed by the passing of Johnny and Matthew Gaudreau
The Braves' three home runs marked the 26th time they achieved this feat in the season
